thread.title: Migori County leaders now target the old and sick to register as voters - VIDEO | The Standard
thread.title_full: Migori County leaders now target the old and sick to register as voters - VIDEO | The Standard

author: Ktn News
title: Migori County leaders now target the old and sick to register as voters - VIDEO | The Standard
text:
News Centre / 22 hours ago [VIDEO] Migori County leaders now target the old and sick to register as voters 
Leaders from Migori County have moved a notch higher in hunting for people to register as voters in the county. The officers are now targeting the old and the sick to register. The move is an attempt to reverse the voter apathy that is said to be high in the region. Speaking at a function where the old and the sick met the IEBC clerks for registration Migori Woman Rep Denitah Ghati noted that the disabled persons and sick are having difficulties reaching voter registration centres.
